Description: Polling stations have opened across Ireland this morning after a three-week election campaign.

Title: Transport Secretary Louise Haigh resigns after mobile phone guilty plea 'mistake'
Description: Transport Secretary Louise Haigh has resigned.

Title: How Ireland's election voting system works

Title: Violent protests in Georgia as 'pro-Russian' government suspends bid to join EU
Description: Violent protests have erupted in Georgia over its ruling party's decision to put talks on the country's longstanding bid to join the EU back until 2028.
